Articles.Content: Maybe In .23 There Could Be Utility Parts That Would be The Size Of A Rockomax Mainsail Engine But Could Expand Into A Station Hub, Please Take My Suggestion In A Good Manner.

How you mean station hub?

Personally if I make a station I fly up a couple of Hitchiker cans and call it a crew module
I usually go with Fustek's hab modules but yeah Hitchhikers too. What exactly are you suggesting Dakota?

What I Mean Is Basically A Command Module Sized Utility That Would Expand Into A Space Station Hub That Has Solar Panels, Docking Ports, and RCS Built In. This Would Make It Alot Easier For New Kerbonauts To Start Space Stations. Thank You.

Space station are a highly advanced part of space. There is a reason you get docking ports so late.

Besides, something the size of what you suggest can be easely send up in a single launch.
